lined up against any change in benefits for Social Security and have begun warning Barack Obama to avoid the entitlement debate in his State of the Union address. Bernie Sanders says he counts Harry Reid among his allies in this fight: The battle lines are forming within the Democratic Party over the charged question of reforming Social Security in the days leading up to Barack Obama 's State of the Union address.
